website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight construction, cot attachments, and an all-in-one design make this a solid choice for tots starting daycare.
pros: Quilted bottom improves cot comfort and offers just enough padding for use on carpeted floors, if necessary
Elastic corner straps provide a secure fit over cots
Removable pillow and a built-in blanket take care of nap time essentials
Available in multiple prints and colors
Safe for the washing machine and dryer
cons: Could do with more padding for floor use

website_summaries.verdict: Includes elastic corner bands to secure the mat tightly to a cot or floor mat at the daycare. Comes in eight fun patterns.
pros: All-in-one nap solution for when you're away from home
Quilted lining will provide extra comfort for your youngster
Includes a hidden pocket so your child can keep a favorite toy close at hand for nap time
Mat rolls up tightly and has a carrying handle so your child can easily take it anywhere
cons: Not as thick as some other nap mats for toddlers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cot cover for daycare!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the blue daycare cots. This is not meant to be a sleeping bag. Some daycares require you to bring a cot cover. They told me I could just buy the fitted sheet for a pack a play mat and bring in a blanket. I saw this as a recomendation on Amazon and thought it was brilliant. A cot cover with a light blanket attached to it. Came with a small pillow too! My daughter is 2 yes old and has plenty of growing room in it. Great quality material was used. I still was it on the gentle cycle, but it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Becker

customer_reviews.title: A daycare necessity!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Easy to clean, easy to pack up, easy to use! My daughter's teacher was so amazed by this nap mat by how easy it was to roll up and how easy it was to set up. She even marveled that it doesn't scrunch up like fitted crib sheets. Anything to help make mine (and their jobs) easier is a WIN in my book!! Daughter loves sleeping in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: We’re going on year three that we bought this, washed every week and it looks like new. The only issue we had was when we washed the pillow as the filling balled up so we don’t use it anymore. But it’s removable and my child doesn’t miss it (or really need it). We’re about to purchase a second one for the younger child. The mat is thin but they sleep in 2” mats at daycare so that’s not a concern for me. The blanket is warm enough. Overall I’m very satisfied with it. I love the variety of designs and colors.
customer_reviews.author: PNM

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase for my toddler!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a preschool teacher so I’ve seen these in my class, but all my children have the same tot cot. I wanted to purchase one that was different and would excite my son, so he’d have an easier time adjusting to nap at school. This super hero tot cot arrived and he was so excited! I had to take it out and unfold it so he could lay on it on the bed! Lol We both love the print, the fact that it’s an all in one, blanket, pillow and mat. I love that it rolls up nicely and has a carry handle. Washes nicely and hasn’t faded it’s color.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: You can't find better mat anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have seen few of those sleeping mats for daycares and schools, and really didn't like ant of them for my child. I needed something that is wide enough to cover her toddler bed in daycare, but something that she can use on mattresses that are used in preschool. I wanted it to have a pillow, a noce design and blanket long enough to cover my wiggly child. And this os IT! I am absolutely recommending it to everyone, and we got so many compliments on designs. Oh, and she loves that she is able to carry it herself, since it rolls up so nicely. If there were 10 stars, I would have given it 10.
customer_reviews.author: Jovana Menkevich

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mat and matching backpack for preschool. We’ve had about a month and a half now. We love both. The mat comes with a pillow and blanket. It’s light and easy to roll up. Every Friday we bring home and just throw it in the washing machine with everything else. It’s holding up great so far. The backpack is small but the perfect size for an extra set of clothes and that’s all she takes anyway. She has also recently realized she can roll up her “lessons” and put them in the side holder. It’s fun for her to bring home and pull out and show me every day. We have received so many compliment on the pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Easy transport and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Just started a new daycare/preschool, and it’s required to bring the bedding. One of the mothers recommended this to me who uses it for her child. I’ve tried it I love it, one less thing to forget on Fridays when taking the kids home on the weekends. It bundles nicely together easy to transport. The bigger thing is it’s easy to wash don’t have to worry about looking for a sheet or a blanket to take back to school on Monday morning, because it’s all attached together.
customer_reviews.author: katrina

customer_reviews.title: My son's preschool mat
customer_reviews.text: My son's second year of preschool and he needs a mat for "rest time". This mat is wonderful because of the built in pillow and blanket. Each Friday the school sends the mat home to be washed. I do not recommend throwing the pillow in the washer, but you can throw it in in the dryer on high setting for 15 minutes to remove germs or kill any dust mites. It rolls up small and he finds it to be very comfortable. The blanket is soft even through 10 washes already. My son is 44" tall, 90th percentile and is almost 5 years old, the mat is long enough for him to still be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this every day at school with the Angeles Germ- Free 2" mat and they fit perfectly together. I take it home at the end of each week, slide out the pillow and throw it in the washing machine, it is a very easy cleaning process and has held up well so far. It has a nice little pocket on the inside big enough to put a lovey or a picture of loved ones, which is what his school said to bring during the transition at the beginning of the year . When you rolled up the four elastic bands that stretch over at nap mat also hold the blanket together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Wynne J.

customer_reviews.title: We purchased two. One for a friend. And ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two. One for a friend. And one for us. Our mat arrived covered in pet hair. It was clearly used. Very disappointing. Update: Urban Infant contacted me right away after this review. I am assuming someone returned it to Amazon, and Amazon resold it in that condition. Urban Infant sent me a new mat immediately. It is set to arrive today. We are excited to use this mat. It folds nicely to fit into a small bag or you can use it rolled up too. The quality is great. My daughter will love the little pocket inside, so she could bring her little lovey.
customer_reviews.author: Ais

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and too synthetic
customer_reviews.text: The material of this feels so synthetic, it grossed me out. My kid wears mostly cotton and wool, almost no polyester. And this may is SO THIN, it’s not cozy at all. Returned it after purchasing the wildkins nap mat which is thicker, the fabric doesn’t feel as gross, and the blanket is actually cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Simcha

customer_reviews.title: They use cots for nap/rest time so this is perfect. I love the little pocket on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our three year old who goes to a two day a week preschool program. They use cots for nap/rest time so this is perfect. I love the little pocket on the inside - perfect for a small stuffed animal. They fleece blanket is thin, but warm enough for an hour nap time. The pillow is a little flatter than I thought it would be, but my daughter doesn’t seem to mind. It seems everyone at her school has a version of of these mats, but I haven’t seen any with as cute of a pattern :) I wash it every week and it’s held up great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measure the cot size beforehand
customer_reviews.text: This item is pricey but worth the extra expense. It's over all made very well with good quality fabrics/fleece and the elastic that fits over daycare cots is really thick and heavy duty which is a huge unexpected plus. The mat easily rolls up for transport to. The one important thing to note is it will not fit on a pre-k size cot that most daycares use. However it easily covers and fits on the smaller sized toddler, 2's, and 3's cot used in daycares. Don't regret buying the item since we will get several years use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: lmlanson

customer_reviews.title: This should be the official daycare nap mat
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased 2 of these for our kids. They are comfortable, perfect size and wash easy. The bands make it easy to roll up and carry by the convenient handle, which is a necessity when corralling 2 kids and all their stuff into daycare. The mat has help up well after countless washes. The prints are all cute, but the teacher at our son's school all comment on how great the metro map pattern is. It is just different and interesting and great for both boys and girls. I recommend this mat to all mom's with kids going to daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great item with training design.
customer_reviews.text: Best tot cot in the market I believed, I searched many but this one was the one my son really loves it, the design taught him how to fold and pack daily after nap easily. Not like others that looks puffy and not easy to be packed even cannot be packed by a little kid. My son learn how to pack it, then looking forward to make his own bed in the morning after woke up.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo L.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and easy to wash and carry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old to use at daycare for his naps. At first I thought this wouldn’t be cushiony enough, haha, but it is just perfect. Daycare provides the cots, and we are to provide the sleep gear, if you will. This nap tot cot is perfect and practical. Fits perfect on the cot and doesn’t slip off the cot due to the elastic band on each corner. Easy to wash as well. Love it! Did I mention my son loves it too?!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great idea realized!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the concept of this nap mat to use on my toddler's school nap cot. It has turned out to be a wonderful purchase. It fits exactly on the cot, and rolls easily without the bulk. I wash mine every week on the hand wash setting of my washer then hang to dry. It had held up very well. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So simple even a blonde can do it
customer_reviews.text: I have one for each of my kids to use at daycare. It is the easiest thing in the world. I used to have a sheet and two different blankets and a separate pillow and then I'd have to make sure I remembered their little blankets and their binkies. This thing has a spot for everything. I bring it home, take out the pillow, throw it in the washer then the dryer and then roll it back up and it's ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: K. Micc

customer_reviews.title: Best product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. My daughter is so proud of her tot cot. She insists on carrying it in and out of schools (we bring it home ince a week for washing). The quality.well exceeds my expectations. Customer service is amazing. Can’t talk this item up enough. I also love it stays put so my daughter isn’t rolling over on a hard cold potentially germ-y cot.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Daycare
customer_reviews.text: When my kid moved from cribs to cots at daycare, we had to start providing bedding. Although we could've just provided crib sheets, I opted for this nap mat. It's soft, easy to clean, doesn't come unbundled when I roll it up, and has held up well. With the hundreds of brands, patterns, and color combos of nap mats out there, naturally another kid in his 6-kid room has the exact same pattern. Clearly a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The material on the pillowcase is too rough
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great nap mat aside from the pillow case material. Based on reviews, it appears that all of the similar nap mats available have the same issue, so instead of returning it, I will just pay someone to recover it with a softer piece of materiel.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A must buy if you’re looking for a cot blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these years ago for my oldest and it has stood the test of time for 5 years now. There hasn’t been any tears or wearing down of the material. The only minor negative is the blanket isn’t as soft as it once was but after 5 years of washing, I’m not complaining. This new one we purchased has held up the same as the other one so far!
customer_reviews.author: Aloisia

customer_reviews.title: Not enough thickness and length as appear in the image.
customer_reviews.text: The dimension is the image won't give a clear idea of how it looks in real. It won't appear to be 1" (inch ) thick. The length is also shorter in a couple of inches. The item is costly for the way it was made. It could be a little bit thicker because using the mat for a few days will make it compressed and still reduces the thickness. Could have been better for the prices.
customer_reviews.author: UK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my toddlers’ nap time at daycare!! He’s 12 months when they started putting him on the cot to nap. I was hesitant because momma bear felt it was too soon but this helps with the anxiety! I love how everything is attached which is great for picking up or putting down. It washes easily and I love the print! Def would recommend this product. It’s a bit on the pricey side but I hope to have this out to good use for a good couple of years!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great nap mat
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old just started daycare and sleeping on a cot for first time. I was happy to find this nap mat with calming colors and designs compared to some of the screaming loud alternatives. The fabric feels a little starchy at first but softens upon washing which we have to do weekly anyway given daycare germs. My son loves the lovey pocket too. My grandmother thought this was so sweet she insisted on buying a matching lunch box, which is also great and includes adorable allergy cards. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bears one is VERY rough.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the overall product. The blanket is very soft and the pad is very soft. My only complaint (and I feel that this is a big complaint) is that the pillow part where the Bear fabric is on top is SO scratchy and rough. My husband threw away the packaging and the box before I was able to look at it so I can't return it. I am going to try to wash repeatedly and see if I can soften it up. But beware that the Bears fabric is very scratchy for a child's face to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Wehmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Packs Up Small & Fits In Cubby
customer_reviews.text: Rolls up small (without the pillow insert) and can be folded even smaller to fit into daycare cubbies! It also has a loop on the end if your daycare has hooks to hang stuff from instead of cubbies. Thin quilt-like thickness is perfect for daycare cots. My toddler loves it and still has plenty of room to grow! Also is machine washeable and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M Dejesus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and dry
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my preschooler's naptime at school. I LOVE that there is a pocket for the pillow and a pocket for a lovey. The blanket portion is very soft and has stayed soft over 8 weekly washings so far, and the pillow isn't lumpy from washing either. It's convenient to clean - just machine wash and machine dry (even the pillow), no special care needed. The attached handle makes it easy to lug around.
customer_reviews.author: Future Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Good simple mat
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for several weeks now and have washed each week with no fading this far. I like that the pillow comes out so the mat can be washed (therefore the pillow doesn’t get lumpy). While I find it easy to roll up and carry, I’ve noticed that the teachers in my daughter’s class always fold it backwards so the handle isn’t exposed. I think they’re just used to rolling pillow down with the mats the other kids have. Definitely keeping an order for this mat on deck when my eldest daughter’s original school mat kicks the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: CLaster

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters preschool said she needed a Nap Matt and a crib sheet to go on top of the cot they provide due to Covid. I found this and asked the teacher if it would work. She said it would be perfect. Grand Baby absolutely loves it. She calls it her “happy napper”! It’s an all in one solution. Matt, blankie, pillow and a special secret pocket for kitty! Simply roll it up and bring it home on Friday’s for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: not much padding but very light n easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to deliver to Singapore Ordered this in traffic design together with Stephen Joseph dinosaur nap mat This mat is much thinner than stephens, not much padding but very light n easy to carry around. Theres a small pocket to put in a small soft toy Fits the regalo portable cot bed perfectly and also for preschools cot bed Just wish that the colours were more vibrant and that the traffic designs were on the napping area instead of the underside of the mat which make the nap mat look a bit dull overall. Overall a good buy but my kid prefer the stephen nap mat more as the colors r much brighter and more softer
customer_reviews.author: ctbu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing all-in-one!! Still looks new.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for just over a year since my child started daycare. It's held up very well after weekly washes. The blanket is still soft and the color hasn't faded. I wash on gentle cycle and line dry. I'm very happy and tell all my mom friends to buy one. Makes life a little easier when you're rushing out the door!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this for daycare naptime! The material was a little stiff in the beginnging but after a few washes it seemed to soften up. love how easy it is to roll up and i added a clip to her backpack so i can attach the blanket there so i have an extra hand. I wash it in cold on delicate and dry on low and its been great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves this!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 18 mo old for her first day of daycare in a new program, where they sleep on cots. This was her first time using something like this as she normally sleep in a crib at home. She loves it so much and slept perfectly on her first day at daycare. The design is super cute and the blanket attached is sooooo soft. Love this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our new tot cot bedding set! We bought 2; one for each toddler. I am expecting to use these for years to come. They fit perfectly on their cots and did NOT move ALL night! We would always have problems with the sleeping bag falling off so this is a wonderful solution. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pillow included. Blanket attached on one side.
customer_reviews.text: A great product with a unique print. I was looking for A great set up for my toddler that would hold up and not look like everyone’s else. This is the perfect sizes for a 4 year old. We have the matching book bag and lunch box. Will recommend to all my mom friends. Even comes with a travel size pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, purchased for my son's preschool
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, light enough for my son to haul it back and forth between classrooms, and he likes the design. No complaints about this product except perhaps the price ... but it's worth it despite being a little more than I would want to pay for what is essentially a kid's sleeping bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for fitting over the toddler nap cot my granddaughter sleeps on when she stays at my house. I layered it over the memory foam nap mat as shown in the description and it fit perfectly over the corners of the cot so it did not pull out or slip during sleep. Plus my granddaughter loved the purple color and the princesses. It washed very easily and is definitely a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: pafarmer

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and cute
customer_reviews.text: This was a splurge for daycare. I loved the all in one idea and design even though it was pricey. It is super easy to bring to daycare on Monday and clean each weekend. And we wrap his bear in the bundle to transport. The blanket has gotten a little pilly after a couple months of use, but nothing crazy. I don’t think the daycare uses it right but oh well!
customer_reviews.author: mjm0216

customer_reviews.title: Convenient  all-in-one cod mattress/blanket
customer_reviews.text: This "sleeping bag" was requested to be purchased for kids by our preschool, but I am pleasantly surprised with it. After about 6 washes its still in "as new" shape. Like the pocket for the pillow,which make its convenient. The mat itself is cotton. I took the star off because blanket/cover up that is sewed in is "fleece" /synthetic material. I wish it was cotton/flannel type
customer_reviews.author: IrisTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and wash
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's daycare uses cots for nap time and one of her teachers recommended Urban Infant. The cot covers stay on the cots really nicely and so far it has held up very well to washing. I like that the pillow is removable for washing and that it rolls up so nicely for transport to and from daycare every week. My daughter has been telling everyone about her new flower cot cover for weeks. I would definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Daycare Dream
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mama sending my little to day care I wanted something comfy yet durable and easy to clean. And this product is perfect. My son loves the hidden pocket where he gets to choose a little stuft animal to take with him each week to school to snuggle with during nap time. And even better we just throw it in the washing machine and dryer for easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: MsBrittany15

customer_reviews.title: Best mat cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got this mat cover for my daughter who is transitioning from sleeping in a crib at daycare to a rest mat. The quality is wonderful and it washes up (take pillow insert out) just as a sheet or blanket would. My daughter instantly lays on this when she sees it on the floor or couch from the training she’s learned via daycare. The blanket is fleece, thin but just enough for a quick nap. Worth the few extra dollars to have everything you need for a rest mat into this one easily rolled up item. Also has a stitched in name tag you can write on.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany T Balajadia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool cots.
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect for daycare/preschool. Purchased one for my son and he has used it for more than a year, washing it nearly every week in the washer/dryer, and still keeping its color, softness, etc. The teachers are also very happy with this, since its easy to rollout and fold up, and stays in place. Just purchased again for my daughter as she starts preschool.
customer_reviews.author: rkm

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old fell in love with her new nap mat for preschool. It comes with a small, cute removable pillow. Lightweight, and seems like it will be easy to clean. (We've only had it a few days.) I began looking on Amazon after seeing the highly priced nap mats at Walmart (they were around $30) that came with no pillow and no blanket attached.) Worth paying a little extra for a better product!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie1213

customer_reviews.title: This has made life so easy! The mini bear goes in the internal pocket
customer_reviews.text: This has made life so easy! The mini bear goes in the internal pocket, it folds up nicely and it's very easy for the kiddos to carry. My only complaint is the color of the "blanket". Because it's cream colored and attracts everything (hair, dirt, dust, etc), it is a little bit of an eye sore by the time it comes home every week. I typically use a lint roller on it before tossing it in the machine. Other than that..such a great piece!
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cot or mat cover but not recommended to use on its own (like a sleeping bag) because there is no padding. Comes with a cute pillow and the built in blanket is made of a fleece material so it’s soft and warm. Only thing I would suggest to the company is to put at least a little bit of filling in the mat to make it a little more comfortable. Other then that it’s a great mat, my 3 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Megmeg

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part about this item is that it seems to be one of the most non-toxic out there at a decent price - very thankful. It is extremely easy to clean & holds up well to the washing machine. It's easy to roll up & transport. My only wish is that it would have more padding to be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional napper, promo code
customer_reviews.text: I bought light blue nap mat with white bunnies, it came with a coupon for 20% off of their website. The mat was was so cute that I went to the urban infant website and bought a matching bookbag and lunch box. Shipping was free and it came with a free gift. the promo code is NAPFRIEND. It seems like the code is reusable so I just figured that I would spread the word to help someone else save a few bucks. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: nice design for day care cots.
customer_reviews.text: Good solution to day care cots as this stays in place. the material is sufficiently soft (it could be softer, but works). I like the little pocket for a stuffed animal, even though the animal is removed immediately. I wish the pocket for the pillow allowed it to sit proud a bit more (it ends up almost flat). I'm also not the biggest fan of fleece because I don't think it breathes, so it would be nice if the blanket was made of something else. overall, a good option for kid cots & definitely beats trying to keep a sheet in place. cute design as well.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat is perfect for my 2-year-old son at daycare. He seems to nap longer using this than a regular crib sheet and blanket -- I think the little pillow and the coziness of the attached blanket help him sleep. I've been washing it once a week on cold/gentle cycle, tumble dry, and it's still looking good after several washes. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LTTaniguchiTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best nap mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Urban Infant nap mat ( we lost our first one ). We love everything about this brands product. It rolls perfectly for easy transporting back and forth to home/daycare, the pillow is perfect and the pocket for comfort items is such a thoughtful touch. The softness and warmth of the blanket is loved by our babe, too. A few days ago he had the worst blow out ever while sleeping on his mat at daycare, I was concerned that it would be ruined, but it washed perfectly clean, completely stain and odor free! We wash it weekly and has yet to show any wear. Great product overall. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is Amazing. It is very soft and comfortable my daughter loves it and wants to take it everywhere she is 2 and a 1/2 years old. It works good with the cot and without the cot. She will be taking it to day care as well along with kindergarten when she goes. Easy to roll up and easy for her to carry by herself. We are taking at to grandma's house next week she will be using it for a week straight. I feel this is a must have for little ones traveling or daycares and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JaMartinez

customer_reviews.title: Fits day care cots and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: This is an exact fit for daycare cots. It has four elastic straps, one on each corner, that easily fit under the left of the cot. A pillow is included but this can be removed if preferred. The top blanket is soft and fairly lightweight. Rolls up to easily fit in cubby. Easy to keep clean - wash and dry this every weekend on our normal cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P.

customer_reviews.title: Love the nap mat--will buy a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the nap mat. The color is accurately represented and looks even brighter and cuter in person. Our mat has been machine washed and dried several times and still looks brand new. My only criticisms are the softness and blanket color. The actual patterned part of the mat is slightly stiff, but it makes sense because it is a durable fabric. The blanket part is very soft, but a beige color. I would prefer a bright colored blanket that coordinated with the patterned material. Neither criticism would deter me from purchasing the product again. In fact, I plan to buy another one for travel.
customer_reviews.author: KGS

customer_reviews.title: great for toddler naps
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for toddler school nap time. my son like it. we bought the replaceable pillow that can be washed because the pillow that comes with this nap map can't be put in the washing machine (we tried, it got all bunched up inside)
customer_reviews.author: chaddy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, will soften with wash, design fits a cot and has a small removable pillow but the sham is sewn in so its great. The fleece blanket attached is slightly wider than the mat to give a little slack. Super lightweight and easy to roll up and store
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Juarez-Salazar

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old is able to carry this nap Matt easily. Not to mention how adorable it is
customer_reviews.text: Very cute lightweight nap Matt. My 2 year old is able to carry this nap Matt easily. Not to mention how adorable it is! I would recommend this to another parent looking for something that will hold up in the wash and wants a clean surface for their child to lay on during nap time!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte R. ellise

customer_reviews.title: Great for nap time...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our young son’s nap time at daycare by their request. We were skeptical at first that he would sleep in this as he has only slept in a crib but he is getting amazing nap time in at school. It seems very comfortable and love that it rolls up easily for transport and has a little pocket for his lovey. Many cute designs too.
customer_reviews.author: PCR

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Comfortable, Affordable
customer_reviews.text: These nap mats are perfect. My toddler uses hers on a flat gym mat on the floor (so they don't roll off) and it works perfectly- she tends to kick blankets but it can't go far. My preschooler has a cot with legs, and the straps make it nice and snug, so it doesn't wrinkle. Teachers are impressed with the ease of rolling and storing, and I love the wash and go aspect. The patterns are nice for both girls, and other parents are jealous. I've shared the info with everyone in the class!
customer_reviews.author: Blaire E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This mat is absolutely perfect for my daughter to bring to daycare. The little blanket is attached and a tiny pillow slips into a pocket, so nothing can really get lost. The straps on it secure it to a standard daycare floor cot, and they also serve as a way to keep it together when it is rolled it. It's really brilliantly designed, and I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat
customer_reviews.text: This nap mat is great. It fit perfectly on an inflatable crib size mattress. We took this camping and our grandchild fit perfectly. I love how the pillow stays in place with the pocket for the pillow and the blanket is attached!! I would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for toddler cots in preschool/daycares! I bought it for my 16 month old and she loves sleeping on it (so the teacher tells me). The teachers also loves how compact and easy it is to put on the cot. I have received multiple compliments about the product. So far it has been durable in the many washes.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Jay

customer_reviews.title: very nice, soft, and long mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very well made, very cozy, and long enough to fit my very tall 4 year old. She can roll it up well herself. The teachers like this brand very much and it has elastics on the corners to keep it in place on the foam nap mat at school.
customer_reviews.author: JagLA

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 20-month old to take on vacation. He really loves it, although didn't sleep on it overnight because he refused to stay on his cot (figures!). He did nap with it though and that went great. He also LOVES to be able to carry it around when it's rolled up - he definitely claimed it as his right away. This will come in handy as he continues to get older (and will stay put on his cot!) so I will probably wind up ordering another one for our younger son eventually. Definitely recommend for day care, travelling, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the princess design. I love that the blanket is attached and the pillow is removable. It is easy to store and roll up for the cubby at daycare. Adds comfort to sleeping on the mats on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Collette

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory!
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept but not a big fan of how the Tot Cot roll up. There is no practical way to prevent the bottom (cover the school cot) from coming in contact with the inside (where my son sleeps). So I wash evertime he comes home from school (only twice a week). Altogether, the Tot Cot is okay. Not a staple or a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeyebrat3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Recommended by teachers
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. Every part of this mat has been designed to work perfectly for our toddlers. Simply love it. I saw several kids at daycare using this brand.. and when the teachers themselves recommended this one over other options, I was sold.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and good quality
customer_reviews.text: We've been using ours for almost a year (except for 3 months break due to covid, it's used every weekday). It has a pillow and a cover, but it's all one piece and easy to fold and carry. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: EMPN

customer_reviews.title: Soft, warm, lightweight, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Daycare LOVED it. Highly recommend. Glad I looked past the reviews- some people are so over the top. I’m extremely particular and OCD about everything. THIS SATISFIED ME 100%. Baby’s comfortable and warm, secure on her cot, that’s all that matters to me!
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have invested in these for my childcare earlier...Didnt want to spend the money because i had to purchase several for my daycare children. But it is well worth the money and should have given in earlier
customer_reviews.author: Julie Y Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Busy mom
customer_reviews.text: Every Monday and Friday I have to carry my youngest child along with 3 different bags (his wet bag, nap gear, and my oldest nap gear) it’s a struggle. I bought these so they are light enough for my oldest to carry hers and for me to be able to carry my son, his totcot, and his wet bag. They came in quicker than expected, they are very durable and my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Its lightweight, easy to clean and durable! The color is not as bright and poppy as I thought it was going to be, but at least the color stays the same even after multiple washes and dries. Our daycare has trouble figuring out how to fold them after it was unrolled, and I wish it has a velcro on its top middle to keep them together better once rolled, but other than that, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design. Preschooler approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my preschooler. It hooks on great to her cot at school and she loves the little pocket. It’s good for a smaller sized stuffed animal or little knickknacks (she loves sticking her socks in there which I find when I wash it every week :)) it could be a little softer but I really like the design and color and it holds up great in the wash. I like to hang dry it though because I’m afraid the blanket will pill.
customer_reviews.author: Squinty P.

customer_reviews.title: Great All In One Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat is convienent...blanket, pillow all in one! The mat is thin so we bought the red & blue mat to lay under this. If your kid sleeps on plush carpet, I think it would be fine but at my son's "school" they sleep on the floor so he needed more cushion. This mat is too long to securely fit over the red & blue mat so I ended up attaching a sheet to the back of the Urban Infant mat, so we could insert the red & blue mat. It made it easier to keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and cleaver designed nap cot cover!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this nap mat cover for our 2 year old granddaughter. The pillow slips into a pocket and the extra inside pocket for a " lovie" is a hit with her. the cover attaches at each corner to her fold up napping cot and she loves the attached blanket. It is very cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: We love this sleeping sack. The print is super cute, too. Only issue we have is that the elastic straps to hold it together when it's rolled up are too loose. The sack tends to come halfway unraveled. That being said, it wouldn't deter me from recommending nor from reordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Billie McCune

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality andong enough for 43inch tall 5 years old PreK boy
customer_reviews.text: Quality is really good. My 5 years old boy needed one for full day PreK. He stopped taking naps 2 years ago so I wondered if he will sleep at school. When lights are off, he sometimes falls asleep with other kids. He is just turned 5 few days ago and about 43inches tall. The crib is about 52inches. Fits perfectly and I like I can just use the bands at the corner to roll the blanks around and take it to school. No bag needed.
customer_reviews.author: HAN HYE SUN

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for naps at daycare. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality - seems to be really well made, especially for the price. Adorable little pattern too (Traffic). Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My kid is obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter moved from the infant room to the toddler room in her school. Her naps shortened in length (to be expected) I thought a cot mat would help her. Her naps didn't really get longer but she loves having it. She squeals with excitement when they bring it out at nap time, she loves carrying it to the house and back to school. The quilted material is very durable; which makes it seem a bit stiff at first but after a few washes it's very comfortable. Will recommend to anyone and will buy for my next kid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preschool!
customer_reviews.text: This is your all-in-one right here! I was worried on my son's first day of preschool that he would not take a nap. The teacher's said this nap mat worked perfect for him, and he napped for 45 minutes on his first day! Wow! I call this the magic nap mat now since it is working so well for him. It washes and dries easy. The little pillow included is just the right size too. I would certainly recommend this item and have to his fellow classmates parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very cute, rolls up easily, worked great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great on my daughters cot that we used for traveling. She loved the little pillow and the pocket for the toy (toy in the pictures is not included). I ended up adding some velcro strips on the blanket and side that opens to keep it closed. My daughter rolls a lot at night, but with the velcro, she stayed in the cot all night for several nights. I've since seen sleeping bags that secure to cots that also have built in pillows. I may have gone that route for the sake of the zipper, but oh well, I like this one nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great Nap Mat & Worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this nap mat to replace another brand nap mat that fell apart after 6 months of use (the blanket tore apart at the seam from the main mat because of our wiggly child). The seams on this mat appear to be very well sewn, and it’s easy to throw in the wash once a week. This nap mat rolls up easily and I love the extra pocket to put our daughter’s lovie in.
customer_reviews.author: DAgonis

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and cute option for nap time for my pre schooler. Easy to wash in the washing machine. Not super soft but well-made and the blanket part that he covers up with is soft enough. It has held up well with weekly washing.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Cute. I just wish it had at least a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute. I just wish it had at least a little padding to it and the pillow was longer and went from one end to the other. When I pick my son up from school and he’s napping I find that his head has usually fallen off one side of the pillow cause it’s not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 17 month old at daycare!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that a regular cot sheet wouldn’t be enough for my daughter at daycare. She just started daycare at 15 months and was having trouble napping even after two weeks. Once we got this cot set she slept great. It’s fluffy enough and has a pillow and it’s easy to clean. Just put it in the wash and let it air dry FLAT or put it in the dryer on low heat. We’ve had it for two months and it works great. I’m very happy with my purchase and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: charmedaj92

customer_reviews.title: I do feel like this version is a hair thicker then the oringal ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this time just a different print. I’ve been using this one since my 3 year old started turned 1 and started sleeping on a cot in Daycare. The first one I purchased is four years old. I wash these weekly and hang to dry. I do feel like this version is a hair thicker then the oringal one I’ve purchased but they are both still in good condition. They have both held up with no tears or fraying.
customer_reviews.author: BoysKanTwo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for naps
customer_reviews.text: Highly satisfied with this tot cover. My 18 month old LOVES napping on this and it fits right on her cot perfectly. She is even able to fold and roll it up on her own after she awakes up. Would definitely recommended to other parents especially those who have children that nap at preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Material is too thin
customer_reviews.text: I always have to bring an extra blanket because the material is so thin that it's not too different from sleeping on the bare ground. There is no cushion in the material. After washing the pillow it bunched up inside so it's a ball and of no use anymore. It is very light weight but certainly not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harley R Breth

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years of use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Cloud one in 2016. After weekly washings of the mat and pillow, it looks almost new (early 2019). It's used five days a week at daycare on the low slung blue cots many daycares use. My child can unroll and repack it easily, and it's durable and comfy. I rarely write reviews (this is either my first or second one), but this mat deserves it. No, the mat is not thick. As someone else pointed out, it's for naptime for a fully dressed child. (Think hourlong nap on the couch...do you need a duvet for that?) After running around all morning, this mat does the trick for nap.
customer_reviews.author: b.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: I think this bedroll is good and its exactly what my almost 2 year old needed for day care. However one of the straps is sewn on twisted and it bothers me every time I have to deal with it. Not a big deal but its a detail thing. I like that the blanket is a nice soft fleece, I will have to see how it holds up to washing. The pocket inside for a stuffed animal is rather small so I had to send a small stuffy. Just something to be aware of. Overall I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stuart Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought this for my daughter to use at her daycare because the other cot cover I bought didn't fit and this one was perfect. The plus factor is the cover that is already attached to it so I don't even have to send a separate blanket for them to cover her with! Love this! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha

customer_reviews.title: Every preschooler should have one!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I purchased this for my daughter to use at preschool and it is perfect. Her teachers love how easy it is to put on and there’s no fuss with a blanket and pillow as they are part of the “sleeping bag” (as my daughter calls it. It is super easy to clean. I just take the pillow out and throw the whole thing (including the pillow) in the wash with her laundry. Same for drying. Every preschooler should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Leto

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy to find these - instead of having to bring ...
customer_reviews.text: My twins started preschool (aka toddler daycare) this past August and I looked for nap mats at pottery barn online as well as major retailers. I was very happy to find these - instead of having to bring separate blanket and fitted sheet for each child. The pillow insert is great and the fact that it's easy to carry and roll up with blanket attached - makes my life much easier when I have to wash and bring for each school week. It's lightweight and even my daughter who is not yet two can carry it with no problem. The Material is well made and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoiedeShoe

customer_reviews.title: Almost 2 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: 22 month old loves this nap mat. Washes easily. Blanket is light and soft. The material on the mat and pillow could be softer, hence my 4 stars. Overall this is a great mat and the elastic straps (and the ability to wash and dry) set it apart from similar products. I went back and forth between this and some of the others and we are very happy thus far. However, as mentioned above, for the price I would have liked a slightly softer material for the mat and pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, little one slept better at school first day we bought it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 2 yr old to use daily at school. Works great, She slept better at school as soon as we bought it. Other kids are jealous of it, it even has a pocket for her snuggle/safety stuffed animal. I think it is a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: I needed a nap blanket for preschool
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is easy to wash. The first one i bought has stood up to nearly a year in preschool so I bought a second. I love that is has a built in pillow for my son. I have already bought two and recommend them for anyone with a kid who naps at preschool/daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and high quality nap mat
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this nap mat for about a month. The pattern is very cute. My daughter loves it. Lots of thought put into designing and building this quality product. I am impressed with this company's product and have bought other products based on the quality. The pillow is appropriate and the mat washes and dries well. The straps and handle are well placed and very handy.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these nap mats.
customer_reviews.text: We got these nap mats for our son & daughter to use at daycare and have been very happy with them so far! After about 4 months of daily use (and weekly trips through the washing machine), they are still holding up very well. Love how they hook onto the blue mats and are easy to roll up/carry around, plus the included pillow and attached blanket make for that much less to remember each week.
customer_reviews.author: R&C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product! Our old one was the Mickey Mouse soft one but the blanket inside this one is very soft but yet the outside is dirty so that you can put it in the small cubbies easily Plus this one has the straps on each corner to go on the cot
customer_reviews.author: Greg Vander Wel

product_meta.title: Urban Infant Tot Cot All-in-One Modern Preschool/Daycare Nap Mat with Washable Pillow and Elastic Corner Straps | 52 x 22 Inches - Poppies
product_meta.description: Color:MultiLet’s face it. Dropping your child off at daycare or preschool can be rough. We’ve been there - leaving them throughout the day and knowing they’ll be napping away from home. Our Tot Cot nap mat is specifically designed to soften this transition for your child. Recommended by Working Mother and Parenting Magazine, our nap mat features a removable and 100% machine washable toddler pillow, thin quilted lining, child's name tag, attached premium no-pill fleece blanket, quick roll-up system, and a handle for easy toting! A great all-in-one alternative to bulky pillows and blankets. Our nap mat fits standard preschool cot (52" x 22"), floor mats (48" x 24") and fits seamlessly on Regalo portable cots. Lightweight, design-conscious, and durable enough to withstand weekly washings for years. Simply machine wash cold and tumble dry. As with all Urban Infant products, our nap mat is lead-safe, bpa-free, phthalate-free, contains no fire-retardant chemicals, and conforms to all Consumer Products Safety Commission rules and regulations. This Tot Cot nap mat is part of our Urban Infant preschool collection that includes coordinating Packie backpacks, Yummie lunch bags, and travel crayon wallets (all sold separately).
feature_bullets: SOFTENS TRANSITION TO SCHOOL — let your child pick their own pattern, personalize the name tag, and slip their favorite plush toy in the “secret pocket” to share their naps away from home
SECURE AND COZY – the first nap mat to feature sewn-in elastic bands that pull over mat / cot corners to assure your toddler's bedding stays in place (also fits on Regalo portable cots)

EASY CARE, KID-PROOF DESIGN — simply cold water wash and tumble dry low – that’s it. And now featuring a machine-washable pillow and no-pill fleece blanket, this nap mat is guaranteed to withstand daily school use and weekly washings for years
AWARD WINNING – Winner of Mom's Choice Award and the National Parenting Seal of Approval, recommended by Parenting and Working Mother magazines

BUILT FOR PRESCHOOL / DAYCARE NAPPERS — portable all-in-one bedding solution for modern on-the-go parents of children attending preschool or daycare – includes removable pillow, sewn-in blanket, and name tag. NEW FEATURES FOR 2020: Removable pillow is now 100% machine-washable, and blanket has been upgraded to a premium double-sided no-pill fleece

specifications.Material free: BPA Free, Phthalate Free, Latex Free, Lead Free
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,910 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
